reason_bug: Aer uses the RTX GPU well below its potential. The GPU is slower than the CPU—it's all about performance.
reason_stack: The observed slowness results from the interaction between Aer GPU, driver, workload, and scheduling in the runtime system: this is an indication for the framework runtime layer.
reason_class: The performance and power state behavior of the GPU depends heavily on the system state, load profile, and runtime decisions, and cannot be reliably predicted using compile-time mechanisms or simple static contracts.
